Palpation to determine foetal lie and presentation
 ∙ The pelvic grips (four in number) are performed to determine the lie and the presenting part of the foetus. The 
grips are Fundal grip, Lateral grip, Superficial pelvic grip and Deep pelvic grip (shown in figure 4).
 ∙ Palpate for the foetal lie and assess whether it is longitudinal, transverse or oblique. Remember that even if a 
malpresentation is diagnosed before 36 weeks, no active management or
